job.title: Software Engineer - Robotics
job.description:
AION Robotics is a manufacturer of rugged autonomous tools serving Energy, Oil/Gas, Agriculture and Security industries.

We're seeking vehicle side Robotics Engineers excited to break free from simulations and get to work on real world deployed robotics systems!

Experienced in:
ROS
Perception/Point Clouds
Sensor Fusion
AWS
C++
Websockets
Javascript
Python
Linux
Real-time networking

Plus:
Java
Android Development
